BlobsSystem3D

Class BoxBrush

  • java.lang.Object
    • BlobsSystem3D.Brush
      • BlobsSystem3D.BoxBrush

  • public class BoxBrush
extends Brush
    A box brush is a brush materialized by a 3D parallelepiped.
    Since:
    2.0
     

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected double depth
      Depth of the rectangle (z)
      protected double hDepth
      Half-Depth of the rectangle.
      protected double height
      Height of the rectangle (y)
      protected double hHeight
      Half-Height of the rectangle.
      protected double hWidth
      Half-Width of the rectangle.
      protected double width
      Width of the rectangle (x)
